item.title: git mergetool and diff with p4merge
item.description: Some time you want visually merge conflict in git. To use p4merge https://www.perforce.com/products/helix-core-apps/merge-diff-tool-p4merge git mergetool Linux $ git config --global merge.tool p4mergetool $ git config --global mergetool.p4mergetool.cmd \ $ "/opt/p4v/bin/p4merge \$PWD/\$BASE \$PWD/\$REMOTE \$PWD/\$LOCAL \$PWD/\$MERGED" $ git config --global mergetool.p4mergetool.trustExitCode false $ git config --global mergetool.keepBackup false Mac $ git config --global merge.tool p4mergetool $ git config --global mergetool.p4mergetool.cmd \ "/Applications/p4merge.app/Contents/Resources/launchp4merge \$PWD/\$BASE \$PWD/\$REMOTE \$PWD/\$LOCAL \$PWD/\$MERGED" $ git config --global mergetool.
